fields.Title of Presentation: Ge 2 Se 3 /Ge 2 Se 3 -M (M = Sn, Al, Ti, W, Cr, Pb, Cu, C)-Based Optically-Gated Transistor (OGT): M Influence on Optical and Electrical Properties
fields.Description/Abstract:
Electronic devices made with alternating layers of undoped and doped chalcogenide materials,
Ge 2 Se 3 /Ge 2 Se 3 -M exhibit transistor-like current-voltage (I-V) curves when illuminated. In this
work, the effect of the metal dopant on the transistor characteristics are measured. The transistor
materials are characterized using UV-Vis to explore the band gap and electronic structure.
Raman spectroscopy is used to verify incorporation of M into the Ge 2 Se 3 material.
Photoconduction is investigated using electrical characterization as a function of wavelength and
light intensity. The devices were tested from 385 to 1200 nm and were operational over that
entire range.
